text: @UAMS_Health Congratulations to the nine UAMS physicians named Healthcare Research All-Stars! 🎉🏥 Their dedication to leading-edge research and top-notch patient care is truly inspiring. 💡👨‍⚕️ It's no surprise that UAMS is among the top 1% of hip and knee surgeons nationwide! 💪 Keep up the amazing work! 💯
